name: Immunity (GameSmith)
description:
Game made for GDS220 2019 Tri 1, Immunity

Real Time Strategy game about defending your body from the invading pathogens using the immune system.

Details the general immune system functionality with specific mechanics of 14 Pathogens: Viruses and Bacteria.

Make decisions at key stages of your life to come into contact with different pathogens and gain immunities, allowing you to find out more about how your body protects itself.
